About the Company: Rai Saheb Rekhchand Mohota Spg. & Wvg. Mills Ltd. (RSR)has vertically integrated itself into divisions namely spinning, weaving and processing. These divisions are designed to create a value adding chain through out the supply chain from raw material to processed fabric. The company delivers a capability to provide wide variety of products suitable for divergent needs of their customers.The product range of the company includes Yarn and Fabrics.
